Interface SearchGraphUtils

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphUtils, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchGraphUtilsBase, SortedSearchGraphUtils, UnsortedSearchGraphUtils

    public interface SearchGraphUtils
extends GraphUtils
    Util methods to interpret and manipulate int-array encoded graphs

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstGeqEdgeId

        int getFirstGeqEdgeId(int[] graphMux,
                      int[] searchMux,
                      int searchFromEdgeId)
        Find the fist edge greater than or equal to a given 1-edge DFS code.
        Parameters:
        graphMux - edge multiplex of the search space graph
        searchMux - edge multiplex of the branch's 1-edge DFS code
        searchFromEdgeId - offset of edge that are already known to be smaller
        Returns:
        first edge id with min DFS code greater than or equal search DFS code

      • addEdge

        Add an edge to a graph multiplex.
        Parameters:
        mux - graph multiplex
        sourceId - source id
        sourceLabel - source label
        edgeLabel - edge label
        targetId - target id
        targetLabel - target label
        Returns:
        updated graph multiplex
